supply.supply_status: Strained - Extended supply lines from Tripoli (900+ km) via coastal road. Division positioned around Tobruk siege perimeter with British garrison creating supply challenges. Fuel reserves 6 days (lower than 15. Panzer due to lighter establishment), ammunition 9 days, water critically constrained at 10L/man/day (desert operations). Heavy reliance on captured British supplies. Supply base: Tripoli port with forward dumps at Derna and Gazala.
